metadata.title: CVE-2023-45871 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/net/ethernet/intel/igb/igb_main.c in theIGB driver in the Linux kernel before 6.5.3. A buffer size may not beadequate for frames larger than the MTU.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-248-generic - 4.4.0-248.282
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-248-generic - 4.4.0-248.282
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-248-lowlatency - 4.4.0-248.282
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-220-generic - 4.15.0-220.231~16.04.1
